description: Grafana Dashboard for Veeam Backup for Azure

panels.description:
On this Map, you can quickly know which VMs are not Protected by Veeam Backup for AWS. 
With a simple, yet powerful view, you can understand and try to mitigate the red spots.
panels.title: Unprotected VMs

panels.description: On this Panel, you can quickly know how much time did a Backup, or Snapshot Policy take. You can quickly filter by Policy Name on the top menu.
panels.title: Job and Policies Duration

panels.description: On this Panel, you can quickly list all your protected VPC on the different Regions

targets.query: SELECT last("VMSize") AS "VM  Size" FROM "veeam_azure_vm_unprotected" WHERE ("VMName" =~ /^$VMName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "VMName", "VMRegion"

panels.title: Protected Amazon VPC

panels.description: On this Panel, you can quickly list all your Protected EC2 Instances

targets.query: SELECT last("VMSize") AS "VM  Size" FROM "veeam_azure_vm_unprotected" WHERE ("VMName" =~ /^$VMName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "VMName", "VMRegion"

panels.title: Protected VMs

panels.description: On this Panel, you can quickly list all your unprotected EC2 Instances

targets.query: SELECT last("VMSize") AS "VM  Size" FROM "veeam_azure_vm_unprotected" WHERE ("VMName" =~ /^$VMName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "VMName", "VMRegion"

panels.title: Unprotected VMs

panels.description: On this Panel, you can quickly list all your protected RDS Instances

targets.query: SELECT last("VMSize") AS "VM  Size" FROM "veeam_azure_vm_unprotected" WHERE ("VMName" =~ /^$VMName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "VMName", "VMRegion"

panels.title: Protected Amazon RDS

panels.description: On this Panel, you can quickly list all your protected EFS Instances

targets.query: SELECT last("VMSize") AS "VM  Size" FROM "veeam_azure_vm_unprotected" WHERE ("VMName" =~ /^$VMName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "VMName", "VMRegion"

panels.title: Protected Amazon EFS

panels.description: On this Panel, you can quickly list all your repositories, with their bucket location, folder, region, and if the Encryption is enabled or not.

targets.query: SELECT last("VMSize") AS "VM  Size" FROM "veeam_azure_vm_unprotected" WHERE ("VMName" =~ /^$VMName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "VMName", "VMRegion"

panels.title: Veeam Backup for AWS Repositories

panels.description: On this Panel, you can quickly list all your Policies.

targets.query: SELECT last("VMSize") AS "VM  Size" FROM "veeam_azure_vm_unprotected" WHERE ("VMName" =~ /^$VMName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "VMName", "VMRegion"

panels.title: Veeam Backup for AWS Policies

list.label: Policy Name
list.name: PolicyName
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM veeam_aws_sessions WITH KEY=sessionPolicyName

list.label: Unprotected VM
list.name: VMName
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM veeam_aws_vm_unprotected WITH KEY=VMName

list.label: Blob Repository
list.name: Repository
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM veeam_aws_repositories WITH KEY=repoName

list.label: Policy Type
list.name: PolicyType
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM veeam_aws_sessions WITH KEY=sessionType

title: Grafana Dashboard for Veeam Backup for AWS
